Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run home run in the top of the ninth inning to give the Mets a 4-2 victory over the Brewers
Post-Match Reflections: Pete Alonso expressed happiness in contributing to the team's victory and mentioned the hard work they put in to reach the playoffs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets advanced in the MLB playoffs by defeating the Brewers in Game 3 of their NL Wild Card Series
Others: The Mets will face the Philadelphia Phillies in the second round of the playoffs starting on Saturday
